case.title: Seeking a submissive girlfriend - 52 (Anywhere)
case.text: I am here to meet a submissive younger lady who wants to have a exciting fun relationship with a dominant older guy ... Vanilla wise I love traveling and seeing new places ( days ... weekends away ... holidays ) theatre ... gigs ... movies ... fab restaurants ... all sorts really ... I am looking for a genuine girl that likes older guys and would like some fun times in and out of the bedroom hopefully leading to a LTR.
